title: Destination: Pluto Beyond the Flyby
description: Join the New Horizons team to examine the latest findings and imagery from Pluto and the fringes of our solar system. They reveal a world unlike any other we've seen yet.

title: The Bodyguard 2016
description: The film chronicles the dramatic journey of Wu-Lin after the death of his martial arts master as he must unleash his secret techniques to save a spoiled, rich girl, who is kidnapped by a group of mobster.

title: Mythica: A Quest For Heroes
description: Trapped in a life of poor slavery, Marek dreams of becoming a wizard. When she meets a beautiful nun, Teela, who needs help, Marek embarks on an epic mission to protect his sister from a leprechaun Teela cruel ... Problems are ahead....

title: The Hornets Nest
description: The documentary film describes the carnage and chaos which become a part of the daily lives and the deaths of American soldiers during the Afghanistan war under eyes of 2 journalists: a father Mike Boettcher and his son Carlos Boettcher. The three-day mission extends to 9 days, reflecting severity of the American longest war.

title: Video Games: The Movie
description: "Video Game: The movie" is a documentary which brings audiences into the history of video game industry to know how to video games are made, marketed, and consumed. The film also reveals storytelling, the art of the video game and the culture that video game created worldwide.

title: Harry Potter And The Half-Blood Prince
description: There are moments of joy, happiness, darkness and lost in Harry Potter And The Half-blood Prince. For this episode, the evil Dark Lord and his hireling’s mysterious past stories revealed more concreted. This is the danger signal for his return. Together, Hogwarts School Professors and Harry Potter in hand have to meet treacherous and fight for the justice.

title: Harry Potter And The Order Of The Phoenix
description: Harry Potter And The Order Of The Phoenix 2007 After a strange dream about a black door, Harry Potter immediately comes and asked Sirius Black with the hope that there is at least someone who can give him a clue. It happens almost every night along with its secrets revealed even more. Very soon, his dreams have been under controlled by the generational Dark Lord – Voldemort. Surrendering and becoming his henchman or returning to dust depends on Harry Potter.

title: Harry Potter And The Goblet Of Fire
description: The Dark Lord nightmare has return on Harry Potter’s dreams. Coming back to the wizard land by visiting a legendary contest among the three famous magic schools name Hogwarts, Beauxbatons and Durmstrang. Being one in the seven most unexpected candidates, it brings Harry Potter lots of troubles including his loyal friends Ron and Hermione misunderstanding and dangerousness. The contest involved three different challenges started with retrieving a dragon’s golden egg, following a mermaid and finally being the first contestant who first touch the cup. This is when a brand new conflict happened.

title: Harry Potter And The Prisoner Of Azkaban
description: Sirius Black - a shame prisoner who was convicted by killing thirteen innocent people, controled by Voldermort - the Dark Lord, and other guits. Escaped to the prison, returned to Hogwards School where Harry and his beloved people are enjoying their daily routines. At the same time, Harry has to against myserious evil death omens and the prisoner. Luckily, on the hardest moment, there is someone who Harry and his friend can count on.

title: Harry Potter And The Chamber Of Secrets
description: In Hogwards School, Harry and his friends are eager for their new school year. Everything is going just great exclusive the house-eelf names Dobby and his message full of warning, the unpredictable voice spreaded from walls, students are under attacked and written message in fresh blood. It has frighten people including wizard professers.

title: Harry Potter And The Sorcerer's Stone
description: an 11-year-old boy whose parent's were both murdered by unknown sources has to learn how to leave his own life alone with his immediate family. Harry soon firgures out his strong connection toward wizard life. he leaves Hagrid's house and his mudane entertainment to find his own path in where his new life has begun. it is much more dangerous, full of unimaginable ceatures but it is worth to fight for the justice and for his parents' death. His best friends and him are sons and daughters of wizard families.
